question.question: Which of the following is a key characteristic of unilateral peripheral facial paralysis (PFP) as depicted in clinical iconography?
question.option_a: Symmetrical facial movements on both sides
question.option_b: Inability to move the lower part of the face while the upper part remains mobile
question.option_c: Complete immobility of the entire face on the affected side
question.option_d: Inability to move the upper part of the face while the lower part remains mobile
